java/liquibase/database/sql/AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00009     private String baseTableName;
00010     private String baseColumnNames;
00011 
00012     private String referencedTableSchemaName;
00013     private String referencedTableName;
00014     private String referencedColumnNames;
00015 
00016     private String constraintName;
00017 
00018     private boolean deferrable;
00019     private boolean initiallyDeferred;
00020 
00021     private boolean deleteCascade;
00022 
00023     public AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement(String constraintName, String baseTableSchemaName, String baseTableName, String baseColumnNames, String referencedTableSchemaName, String referencedTableName, String referencedColumnNames) {
00024         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00025         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00026         this.baseColumnNames = baseColumnNames;
00027         this.referencedTableSchemaName = referencedTableSchemaName;
00028         this.referencedTableName = referencedTableName;
00029         this.referencedColumnNames = referencedColumnNames;
00030         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00034         return baseTableSchemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public String getBaseTableName() {
00038         return baseTableName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getBaseColumnNames() {
00042         return baseColumnNames;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getReferencedTableSchemaName() {
00046         return referencedTableSchemaName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getReferencedTableName() {
00050         return referencedTableName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getReferencedColumnNames() {
00054         return referencedColumnNames;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getConstraintName() {
00058         return constraintName;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public boolean isDeferrable() {
00062         return deferrable;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement setDeferrable(boolean deferrable) {
00066         this.deferrable = deferrable;
00067         return this;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public boolean isInitiallyDeferred() {
00071         return initiallyDeferred;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement setInitiallyDeferred(boolean initiallyDeferred) {
00075         this.initiallyDeferred = initiallyDeferred;
00076         return this;
00077     }
00078 
00079     public boolean isDeleteCascade() {
00080         return deleteCascade;
00081     }
00082 
00083     public AddForeignKeyConstraintStatement setDeleteCascade(boolean deleteCascade) {
00084         this.deleteCascade = deleteCascade;
00085         return this;
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00089         String sql = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getBaseTableSchemaName(), getBaseTableName()) + " ADD CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName() + " FOREIGN KEY (" + getBaseColumnNames() + ") REFERENCES " + database.escapeTableName(getReferencedTableSchemaName(), getReferencedTableName()) + "(" + getReferencedColumnNames() + ")";
00090 
00091         if (isDeleteCascade()) {
00092             sql += " ON DELETE CASCADE";
00093         }
00094 
00095         if (isDeferrable() || isInitiallyDeferred()) {
00096             if (!database.supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns()) {
00097                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support deferrable foreign keys", this, database);
00098             }
00099 
00100             if (isDeferrable()) {
00101                 sql += " DEFERRABLE";
00102             }
00103 
00104             if (isInitiallyDeferred()) {
00105                 sql += " INITIALLY DEFERRED";
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109         return sql;
00110     }
00111 
00112     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00113         return ";";
00114     }
00115 
00116     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00117         return true;
00118     }
00119 }
